name: Planet Brawl
description:
Introduction

Welcome to PLANET BRAWL

You have been chosen to participate in a galactic battle, fight yourself to the top and be crowned the ultimate winner!

You have to fight yourself through multiple waves of different enemies, each with their own weapon. Speaking of which, which one will you go for? A fast rapid fire gun? or maybe the awesome beam weapon?

Will you be the ultimate winner?

Features
  • Weapon progression system
  • Multiple upgrades
  • Wave spawning system
  • Enemy Tiers
  • And a bossfight at the end
